@earthroc:
你活在你的泡泡裡面嗎？其他國家的官員跟媒體沒事不會特別說共產黨或中國共產黨來指中國。

(CNN) China has ended its lockdown of Wuhan, the original epicenter of the coronavirus crisis, as the city reemerges from a deadly outbreak that is now raging across the globe.
還是 The Chinese Communist Party has ended its...?

(The Guardian) Britain’s intelligence community believes the UK needs to reassess its relationship with China after the coronavirus crisis subsides and consider if tighter controls are needed over high-tech and other strategic industries.
還是 UK needs to reassess its relationship with The Chinese Communist Party...?

(CNN JP) ＷＨＯトップへの人種差別攻撃、中国の「情報操作」と台湾
還是 中国共産党の「情報操作」...?

(India Today) But China is not the only one to be held accountable for this crisis of credibility of the UN.
還是 But The Chinese Communist Party is not the only one to be held accountable...?

(EUROGAMER) China bans sale of Animal Crossing
還是 The Chinese Communist Party bans sale of Animal Crossing...?

中國的主人不是中國人民，中國的主人是中國共產黨，很遺憾，但這是事實。中國共產黨代表中國，無論在任何國際場合，代表中國的都是中國共產黨。新聞跟官員都會說「北韓發射飛彈」，不會特地說，北韓政府發射飛彈。你想捍衛中國這名字我可以了解，但毫無意義。你最大的希望是等共產黨倒台後，協助中國改變國際形象。
